items.sentence: Even though we were supposed to meet at 10, I've had no contact with them. I wonder if they've had an accident.
Tom got poor marks at school because, having to work on his parents' farm, he had hardly any time for studying.
The telethon is a French TV program organized every year to collect funds in order to finance medical research.
Right and wrong are two faces of the same coin. Whoever has the power decides which face gets what inscription.
Who would have thought that Tom's small garage workshop would one day be a company with a turnover of millions?
